conbody.p: When, in accordance with the provisions of FAR 19.502-3, the contracting officer determines that a particular procurement will be partially set aside for small business participation, the solicitation for bids shall include the appropriate product or service classification and appropriate size standard, and the following statement shall be placed on the face page:
Notice of partial set-aside, page ____, applies to item ____ through item ____ in this solicitation.
